main event: Two objects were observed in the sky over Texarkana, Texas on June 26, 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 40-45 seconds at night,The objects were described as round and observed at a very high altitude in the northwestern sky, During the observation, the objects split into four different places along their trail and eventually faded after about half an hour, Observers had differing opinions on whether the objects could be balloons, satellites or possibly aircraft, There were 2 confirmed witnesses who did not have prior experience with UFOs.
sighted object: two round objects in the sky
witness description: Observers reported seeing the objects clearly at night.
